author.bio: Web application security and accessibility evangelist. Software instructor. Conference lecturer and presenter.

wordpressPost.title: Vulnerable WordPress Plugins Report for the Week of November 17, 2017
wordpressPost.excerpt: Vulnerable Plugins Twenty-two disclosures this week, with ten issues unfixed. View this week's vulnerable plugins list. The critical updates you should be aware of from this week's list are in...
wordpressPost.content:
Vulnerable Plugins

Twenty-two disclosures this week, with ten issues unfixed.

View this week’s vulnerable plugins list.

The critical updates you should be aware of from this week’s list are in Formidable Forms, discovered by Klikki Oy, and in WP Support Plus Responsive Ticket System, discovered by Robert Mathews. If you are using either of these plugins, please make sure to update as soon as possible.
